summary: A retexture of the Divine's shrines.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5523/9170553326_90e3272b44_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]
[center]A complete retexture of the Divine's shrines.[/center][/size]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][size=+1]Other Versions here:[/center]

v.Old[/size]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2852/9167402491_00f275b5b8_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5523/9169624372_cc462c502e_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5548/9167402993_bd9faf7980_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3676/9169623160_703e94b21f_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2866/9167401659_b3e6c4c632_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3829/9169622152_0af80a579a_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2880/9169759942_f7ae5537b1_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5498/9170625516_2811ec4cf3_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2815/9167404287_6c77be4720.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=+1]As [u]optional files[/u] you can choose:

Pedestals: Normal(already in the main file) Rusty or Silver versions.[/size]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3728/9167403931_20797a9836_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5498/9169758600_dd6a53a828_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7363/9169759158_36c390846d_n.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=+1]Golden version of the shrines: (examples)[/size]


[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5509/9177857430_fccbdc45d5_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5549/9177856892_2b95f448ea_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7322/9177856472_0fe0d803cb_n.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=+1]Other version of Akatosh and Kynareth shrines (requested):[/size]

author: Andre7890

files.name: The Divine Shrines Retexture
files.changelogHtml:
add 2048 HD versions of Arkay and Akatosh shrines.
add other Kynareth versions on request
